movie.title: PHP: Behind the Parser
movie.plot: So, this language. It's like, a programming language. Or is it a scripting language? All is revealed in this thrilling horror spoof of a documentary.

movie.title: Javascript: Behind the Parser
movie.plot: So, this Javascript. It's like, a programming language. Or is it a scripting language? All is revealed in this thrilling horror spoof of a documentary.
